CustomField.formula: IF(((Product2.ProductCode = "ENT_ETH_EIA_0002" && Speed_Mbps__c >= 5000) || (Product2.ProductCode = "ENT_ETH_EVPL_0010" && Speed_Mbps__c >= 500) || (Product2.ProductCode = "ENT_ETH_EVPL_0020" && Speed_Mbps__c >= 5000) || (Product2.ProductCode = "ENT_ETH_UNI_0001" && Speed_Mbps__c >= 5000) || (Product2.ProductCode = "ENT_ETH_EVPL_0002" && Speed_Mbps__c >= 500)) , true, false)
CustomField.label: HBE Requested
